related_questions.question:
Binder Note High a    Penguin is aquatic, flightless bird. Most of their species live in cold climates area. They have
adapted to live in cold climates.
Penguins have to keep body temperatures high to remain active. They have thick skin and lots of
fat (blubber) under their skin to keep warm in cold weather.
They also huddle together with their friends to keep warm. Emperor penguins have developed a
social behavior that when it gets cold, they huddle together in groups that may comprise several
thousand penguins.
The dark colored feathers of a penguin's back surface absorb heat from the sun. It also keeps
them to warm up too.
Penguins tightly packed feathers overlap to provide waterproofing and warmth. They coat their
feathers with oil from a gland near the tail to increase impermeability. Waterproofing is critical to
5. From the text we know that...
A. penguin fats help them absorb the heat from sun
B. penguins huddle together during mating season
C. penguins can swim faster by coating their feather with oil
D. penguin fats protect them from cold
E. penguins' beaks are waterproof​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. penguin fats protect them from cold

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

we went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

past tense jd v2

Jawaban:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

Past tense merupakan kata yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan kejadian yang telah terjadi di masa lampau.

Perbedaannya dengan present tense adalah verb yang digunakan.

Present tense menggunakan verb 1, dan past tense menggunakan verb 2.

Maka verb 2 dari go adalah:

go → went

Past Tense Sentences:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

related_questions.question:
4. The best arrangement of these jumbled sentences to be a good recount text is....    a. Finally I went home with my friends happily.
b.After swimming, I put on again my bathing suit and go to the bathroom to rinse my body.
c. Yesterday I went to swimming pool with my friends.
d.I brought my bag which is full of things I needed in the swimming pool.
e.I wore my clothes and put all the wet clothes into the plastic bag, so my bag would not get wet by water.
f. When we arrived there, I changed my clothes into swimsuit then I did a little warming up before I got into the pool.
A. C-d-f-e-b-a
B. a-c-b-d-f-e
C. d-c-b-f-a-e-
D. b-d-a-f-e-​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

c-d-f-b-e-a

Penjelasan: i can't find any correct answer from the option. so, i make one of mine. hope this find you helpful ^•^

related_questions.question:
6. "Would you mind not closing the window?"    The sentence has the same meaning with :
A. Do not close the window, please.
B. Close the window, please,
C. The window must be closed
D. Don't open the window, please.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Do not close the window, please.

related_questions.question:

Answer:...

5. Where does a waiter work?

answers.answer:

1. we use the plate to eat/to put our food on it.

2. policeman works in the police station.

3. flying around from one flower to another flowers.

4. pilot is someone who fly an aeroplane.

5. the waiter works in a restaurant.
